website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Iconia W700-6465 slate tablet shows where Microsoft wants to go with touch-based Windows 8, plus it's more compatible with your existing software than anything running Windows RT.
cons: Text and UI are small in desktop mode
Needs Wacom digitizer stylus compatibility for artists and engineers

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is seriously not even worth the plastic it's made out of.
customer_reviews.text: Internet stops working if you ever reset it unless you repurchase widows 10. The battery is inaccurate. It can't even connect to the keyboard it comes with. The virtual keyboard has issues. I could go on and on about all the problems it's no wonder they don't let you return it! It's seriously not even worth the plastic it's made out of. I took a knee to this abomination and put it in the trash where it belongs. The only regret I have is ever purchasing it in the first place and if I got my hands on another one I'd break it as well. Please don't purchase this tablet unless you really want someone to suffer from it.
customer_reviews.author: shem

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet!
customer_reviews.text: This product s truly amazing. I have had many tablets, laptops, convertibles...you name it...and this one simply has no equal. Excellent feel, fit, materials and build. It really hums along with the i5, and can do any task you throw at it. This is in another league from the Rt tablet I own, which itself trumps the IOS and Andriod tablets. If you are thinking about the W700...get it!
customer_reviews.author: Carl E. Logan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. it can do pretty much what you want it to. i've done everything from watching netflix on the already provided app (though you still must have an account), to playing WoW off of an external hard drive. A tablet that can play WoW is definitely a tablet that can meet your needs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: It is an excellent Windows Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Tablet is complete. In my opinion it has nothing to envy to an Ipad or Android Tablet. In the short time that I have I have taken full advantage. It is an excellent Windows Tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Aristides Lorlesse Gómez

customer_reviews.title: Time to replace notebook with Win8 tab
customer_reviews.text: I want full compatibility when web surfing and ppt so no way to compromise with android or ios. I had bad experience with cheap Asus tablet 91mt and wait till this model comes out. Battery is excellent over 7 hours with web and office. I won't carry charger for customers visit anymore. I do have disappointment but it is nothing related to this product. Cisco vpn don't officially support 64bit and US airport TSA lose my HDMI to VGA adaptor. So it is still five star before Surface Pro comes out. By the way, I buy a usb to lan with 88772b chips.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely AWESOME deal
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for some time and I absolutely love it. While I am happy about the dock, I wish it would have included a lan port. I can forgive the lack of a sd card because of the lovely Bluetooth keyboard. Battery live is decent (about 5-6 hours running VS2012). Overall it's a great piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: S. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: great piece of hardware, terrible wifi
customer_reviews.text: I must say, i love this tablet... it's fast, screen resolution is gorgeous and it has a key board and a case... the only thing that frustrates me is the constant wifi drop... i hope acer comes out with a solution for this, and fast...
customer_reviews.author: timkat

customer_reviews.title: It's good unless fixing the wireless problem
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is not so good. Firstly I would say the hardware is very good and awesome. However, the most serious problem is the wireless. As many users found, this machine always miss connection. It makes me so angry and crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Zhongqiao Zhuang

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money
customer_reviews.text: Tablet works flawlessly. I am using it to beta test some proprietary accounting and imaging software not yet optimized for Windows 8 or touch screen. I have 2 machines, 1 for 6 months, and battery life is very good considering the the imaging demands we place on it. For the money, it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: J. ritter

customer_reviews.title: It is OK
customer_reviews.text: I can't say I love it a lot. Good for common use, not good enough for professionals. As a portable computer, it is heavy. As a desk computer, it is more proper.
customer_reviews.author: Hidrli H.

customer_reviews.title: Good but has some bugs
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is that the sound sometimes does not work and you have to put it to sleep then turn it back on to get it to work. Other than that it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Mosher

customer_reviews.title: hardware/software bug in acer Iconia w700
customer_reviews.text: Tablet is bulky and more weight to hold for long. WIFI conectivity bug in across all acer tablets. Network disconnects very frequently like every 3 to 4 minutes and connect back after 1 min this is very pain full to watch a long video.
customer_reviews.author: Doraswamy Reddy Gophati

customer_reviews.title: Good hardware, maturing OddS
customer_reviews.text: The tablet works fine. Handles the mixed experience of touch interaction and mouse&keboardher ca well. The leather casing is brilliant. The docking station is useless. Just use the sturdy and flexible leather casing to position your tablet. You can use it as a replacement for a standard laptop but windows 8 requires a HUGE effort to make this efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Lars Hoegsted

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet "FIX FOR WIFI ISSUES"
customer_reviews.text: 1. Download Acers W700 Wifi Driver and unzip all folders. 2.Go to Device Manager and find the Atheros Wifi adapter 3.Click delete/remove device 4.A message will pop up asking for confirmation, CLICK THE CHECK-BOX REMOVE/DELETE DRIVERS!! This wont work if you don't. 5.In device manager click "scan for hardware changes" 6.You should now see a new or unknown device, click on it and tell windows to install it. 7. Windows will ask for the drivers , POINT IT TO THE UNZIPPED FOLDER SO IT CAN FIND THE DRIVER 8. Restart 9. Enjoy your Wifi ------- Overall love this tablet , just wish it have integrated GPS,removable battery and a SD card.
customer_reviews.author: Roboguy

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but problems, and Acer is the biggest one
customer_reviews.text: I should have known better than to buy another Acer tablet. The thing is just plagued with problems, and Acer (again) is no help at all. The keyboard never stays connected, the device is slow and laggy, it crashes all the time. And this is the first two weeks of owning it. I would not recommend this product. I would not recommend Acer.
customer_reviews.author: empirep

customer_reviews.title: Black screen, repaired twice, product not replaiced, unreliable
customer_reviews.text: My tablet is getting black after some time, from one minute to one hour. There is no screen working anymore but the fans are running. After first repair, the problem was still there, coming back after 5 minutes. The tablet is 2 months old, but Acer would not replace it. So second repair going on. I do not trust the product anymore. Acer is having a bad quality policy !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: 1 star
customer_reviews.text: I give this product 1 stars due to user error. So, there you go, just eat it, folks. © 2012 me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Acer Iconia W700-6691 11.6-Inch Tablet (1.7 GHz Intel Core i5-3317U Processor, 4GB DDR3, 64GB SSD, Windows 8) Silver
product_meta.description:
Acer Iconia W700-6691 Tablet comes with these high level Specs: 3rd Generation Intel Core i5-3317U Processor, Windows 8, 11.6" Full HD 1920 x 1080 resolution high-brightness (350-nit) Acer CrystalBrite LED-backlit TFT LCD, 10-Point multi-touch screen, supporting finger touch and image auto rotatio, Intel HD Graphics 4000 with 128MB of dedicated system memory, Optimized Dolby Home Theater v4 audio enhancement, 4096MB of DDR3 On-Board System Memory, 64GB Solid State Drive, Acer Invilink Nplify 802.11a/b/g/n Wi-Fi Certified, Bluetooth 4.0+HS, 5MP Rear-facing HD camera, Front-facing HD camera, 1 - USB 3.0 Port, 1 - Micro-HDMI out with HDCP support, 3-Cell Li-Polymer (4850 mAh) Battery, Up to 9-hours Battery Life, 2.09 lbs. | 0.95 kg (tablet only) - INCLUDES Docking Cradle and Bluetooth Keyboard

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Intel Core i5 3317U 1.7 GHz (3 MB Cache)
